body:
So, after a few years of abuse, looks like my graphics card has finally died. That's why I wasn't on Avicus yesterday. I'm not surprised, i got it a few years ago used.

I ordered a new one, but it won't get here for another week, so looks like I won't be on Avicus for a while (except a tiny bit at school)

title: Graphics card died...
